title: Highest movement speed in end of game statistics
body:
I was in a game with some friends of mine, and one of them was trying to put as much movespeed on Skarner as possible. We suddenly thought "Hey, it would be pretty cool if you could see what your highest total movement speed during a game was (excluding homeguards) in the end of game statistics". 

I have no idea if this is even possible, but i just think it would be another cool thing to add to the advanced statistics table (I mean they have Neutral Minions Killed in Enemy Jungle). Thoughts?

replies.body:
Honestly it's a pointless stat to track, cause it's gonna be useful for "herderigofast" which lets be honest, how often would you look at?

If stats like this were included (because if your being fair you have to include all of them) the stat page would be a mess.
